Lesson Plans

Why Are Orchids So Successful?

(Book Pages: 30-33)
Download Full Lesson Plan

Introduction

  • What does it mean to be a generalist or a specialist? For animals? For plants?
  • Do you think of yourself more as a generalist or a specialist in life?
  • What strategies do orchids use to increase their chances of survival?
  • Download the full lesson plan for more!
